name: The Escape (itch) (SpaceGuinea Productions)
description:
The Escape is a game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jame 2020.

Escape out of control of the game and get 2 different endings.

READ THE CONTROLS HERE:

Controls:

Move Left: Left Arrow

Move Right: Right Arrow

Jump: Space Bar

Keep Reading Dialogue: Up Arrow

Grab Crate: Down Arrow

Go Back Main Menu: Escape

The game is very early in its lifespan, and has several bugs and glitches, and very little sound effects, but as I only had 48 hours to the make the game I couldn't fix that.
